overview_of_class: Practicum in adaptation for first-year MFA students in the Theatre MFA Directing Program. The course is offered in conjunction with PERF_ST 224 "Adapting Narrative for Group Performance," which in Winter Quarter 2015 meets W F 3-5.
name: Practicum: Adaptation/Staging of Texts
title: SoC PERF_ST 424-0-20 Practicum: Adaptation/Staging of Texts

instructors.instructor_addr: Annie May Swift Hall, Room G03
